(at learning limit for this race): Agility: Each point gives five weapon points and increases weapon speed by 0.5%. The following skills can not be developed beyond 1/3 of Agility: Weapon Master, Shield, Athletics, Riding, Mounted Archery, Looting.

In The Last Days, you need Resource Points to obtain equipment. Resource Points are a measure of how willing a faction is to keep you supplied, and of how much of the faction resources you are entitled to use.

ui_at_learning_limit: # swy: added from this spreadsheet, as requested by our translators:

(at learning limit for this race): Are you sure you want to import the character?
Strength: Every point adds +1 to hit points. The following skills can not be developed beyond 1/3 of Strength: ironflesh, Power-strike, Power-throw, Power-draw.

Intelligence: Every point to intelligence immediately gives one extra skill point, and slightly increases XP gain on some occasions. The following skills can not be developed beyond 1/3 of Intelligence: Trainer, Tracking, Tactics,  Path-finding, Spotting, Inventory Management, Wound Treatment, Surgery, and First Aid.

Charisma: Improves your standing with people and factions. Each point increases your party size limit by +1 (0.5 for companions). The following skills can not be developed beyond 1/3 of Charisma: Prisoner Management, Wildcraft, Leadership, Trade.
